# John Langford Hayward

John Langford Hayward (26 April 1923 â€“ 24 February 2013), was a British breast surgeon who researched treatment for advanced breast cancer. In 1945, while studying medicine at Guy's Hospital, he assisted with the Relief effort at Bergen-Belsen concentration camp as a voluntary medical student. He graduated in 1947.
See also
*List of London medical students who assisted at Belsen
